languages.text: В память о потере этого достойного мира, а равно и всех, кто погиб на поверхности его или обрел судьбу хуже смерти, на орбитальных стапелях Футфола был заложен величественный кафедральный корабль "Жертва Райкада". Реактор Чудотворного Синтеза питал его двигатели и орудия, наполняя их яростной мощью Движущей силы.

In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.
languages.original_text: В память о потере этого достойного мира, а равно и всех, кто погиб на поверхности его или обрел судьбу хуже смерти, на орбитальных стапелях Футфола был заложен величественный кафедральный корабль "Жертва Райкада". Реактор Чудотворного Синтеза питал его двигатели и орудия, наполняя их яростной мощью Движущей силы.

traits.locale_text: In honour of the great sacrifice made by the system, the construction of a glorious cathedral ship under the name of Rykad Sacrifice started on the orbital slipways of Eufrates II. The Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of Motive Force.

In honour of the great sacrifice made by the system, the construction of a glorious cathedral ship under the name of Rykad Sacrifice started on the orbital slipways of Eufrates II. The Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of Motive Force.

In honour of the great sacrifice made by the system, construction began on the orbital slipways of Eufrates II of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

In honour of the great sacrifice made by the system, construction began on the orbital slipways of Eufrates II of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

languages.text: 为了悼念莱卡德的死难者，以及那些遭遇更加可怕命运的人们，落脚港的轨道上建造起了光荣的教堂船，名为“莱卡德牺牲”号。神赐聚变反应堆产生了强大的源力，为这艘舰船的引擎与大炮提供能量。
languages.original_text: In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

traits.locale_text: 为了纪念这个星系做出的巨大牺牲，欧夫拉茨二号星的轨道上建造起了光荣的教堂船，名为“莱卡德牺牲”号。神赐聚变反应堆产生了强大的原初动力，为这艘舰船的引擎与大炮提供能量。

languages.text: In Erinnerung an diese Welt und alle, die auf ihrer Oberfläche der Tod oder ein weit schlimmeres Schicksal ereilte, begann man in den orbitalen Werften von Footfall mit dem Bau eines ruhmreichen Kathedralenschiffs, das Opfer von Rykad heißen sollte. Der Wundersame Fusionsreaktor versorgte seine Maschinen und Geschütze mit der ungeheuren Macht der Antriebskraft.
languages.original_text: In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

traits.locale_text: Zu Ehren des großen Opfers des Systems begann in den orbitalen Werften von Eufrates II der Bau eines glorreichen Kathedralenschiffs, das Opfer von Rykad heißen sollte. Der Wundersame Fusionsreaktor versorgte seine Maschinen und Geschütze mit der ungeheuren Macht der Antriebskraft.

languages.text: Afin de rendre hommage à ce monde et à tous ceux qui avaient péri à sa surface ou avaient connu un sort pire que la mort, on débuta la construction d'un glorieux vaisseau-cathédrale nommé le Sacrifice de Rykad dans le port orbital de Castel. Ses moteurs et ses canons étaient alimentés par le réacteur à fusion miraculeux, qui les emplissait de la puissance de la Force Motrice.
languages.original_text: In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

traits.locale_text: Afin de rendre hommage à ce monde et à tous ceux qui avaient péri à sa surface ou avaient connu un sort pire que la mort, on débuta la construction d'un glorieux vaisseau-cathédrale nommé le Sacrifice de Rykad dans le port orbital de Castel. Ses moteurs et ses canons étaient alimentés par le réacteur à fusion miraculeux, qui les emplissait de la puissance de la Force Motrice.

languages.text: En recuerdo de este mundo y de todos quienes perecieron sobre su superficie o hallaron un destino aún peor, en las gradas orbitales de Paso dio comienzo la construcción de una gloriosa nave catedral llamada Sacrificio de Rykad. El Reactor de Fusión Milagroso proporcionaba energía a sus motores y cañones, llenándolos del poder imparable de la Fuerza Motriz.
languages.original_text: In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

traits.locale_text: En honor al gran sacrificio realizado por el sistema, en las gradas orbitales de Eufrates II dio comienzo la construcción de una gloriosa nave catedral llamada Sacrificio de Rykad. El Reactor de Fusión Milagroso proporcionaba energía a sus motores y cañones, llenándolos del poder imparable de la Fuerza Motriz.

languages.text: この惑星と、そこで死した者たち、あるいは死よりも過酷な運命をたどった者たちを偲び、フットフォールの軌道上の滑走路で、ライカドの犠牲と呼ばれる壮麗な大聖堂船の建造が始まった。奇跡のフュージョンリアクターがエンジンと大砲の動力源となり、獰猛な原動力が燃料となる。
languages.original_text: In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

traits.locale_text: この惑星と、そこで死した者たち、あるいは死よりも過酷な運命をたどった者たちを偲び、フットフォールの軌道上の滑走路で、ライカドの犠牲と呼ばれる壮麗な大聖堂船の建造が始まった。奇跡のフュージョンリアクターがエンジンと大砲の動力源となり、獰猛な原動力が燃料となる。

languages.text: Bu dünyanın ve yüzeyinde telef olan veya ölümden daha beter bir sonla karşılaşan herkesin anısına, Binliman'ın yörünge kızaklarında Rykad'ın Fedakârlığı adında görkemli bir katedral geminin inşasına başlandı. Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü; motor ve toplarına güç sağlıyor, onları Devinim Gücü'nün şiddetli enerjisiyle dolduruyordu.
languages.original_text: In memory of this world and all who perished on its surface or met a fate worse than death, construction began on the orbital slipways of Footfall of a glorious cathedral ship to be called Rykad's Sacrifice. The Miraculous Fusion Reactor powered its engines and cannons, fuelling them with the fierce power of the Motive Force.

traits.locale_text: Bu dünyanın ve yüzeyinde telef olan veya ölümden daha beter bir sona maruz kalan herkesin anısına, Binliman'ın yörünge kızaklarında Rykad'ın Fedakârlığı adında görkemli bir katedral geminin inşasına başlandı. Motorlarına ve toplarına gücü Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü sağlıyor, onları Devinim Gücü'nün şiddetli enerjisiyle dolduruyordu.
